name: NSCollectionViewLayoutInvalidationContext
desc: An object that identifies the portions of your layout that need to be updated.

items.name: var invalidateEverything: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether all layout data should be marked as invalid.

items.name: var invalidateDataSourceCounts: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the layout object should ask for new section and item counts.

items.name: var contentOffsetAdjustment: NSPoint
items.desc: The delta value to add to the collection view’s content offset.

items.name: var contentSizeAdjustment: NSSize
items.desc: The delta value to add to the collection view’s content size.

items.name: func invalidateItems(at: Set<IndexPath>)
items.desc: Marks the specified items as invalid so that their layout information can be updated.

items.name: func invalidateSupplementaryElements(ofKind: NSCollectionView.SupplementaryElementKind, at: Set<IndexPath>)
items.desc: Marks the specified supplementary views as invalid so that their layout information can be updated.

items.name: func invalidateDecorationElements(ofKind: NSCollectionView.DecorationElementKind, at: Set<IndexPath>)
items.desc: Marks the specified decoration views as invalid so that their layout information can be updated.

items.name: var invalidatedItemIndexPaths: Set<IndexPath>?
items.desc: The set of items whose layout attributes are invalid.

items.name: var invalidatedSupplementaryIndexPaths: [NSCollectionView.SupplementaryElementKind : Set<IndexPath>]?
items.desc: A dictionary containing the supplementary views whose layout attributes are invalid.

items.name: var invalidatedDecorationIndexPaths: [NSCollectionView.DecorationElementKind : Set<IndexPath>]?
items.desc: A dictionary containing the decoration views whose layout attributes are invalid.
